text: Clément Champoussin (born 29 May 1998) is a French cyclist, who currently rides for UCI WorldTeam . In October 2020, he was named in the startlist for the 2020 Vuelta a España. ==Major results== ;2018 : 2nd Ruota d'Oro : 3rd Piccolo Giro di Lombardia : 5th Overall Tour de l'Avenir : 7th Overall Kreiz Breizh Elites : 9th Overall Ronde de l'Isard ;2019 : 1st 20px Overall Giro del Friuli-Venezia Giulia ::1st 20px Points classification ::1st Stages 1 (TTT) & 4 : 2nd Piccolo Giro di Lombardia : 3rd Overall Ronde de l'Isard : 3rd Overall Grand Prix Priessnitz spa : 4th Overall Tour de l'Avenir : 6th Overall Orlen Nations Grand Prix ::1st Stage 1 (TTT) : 9th Overall Giro di Sicilia : 9th Gran Piemonte ;2020 : 8th Overall Tour de Luxembourg ===Grand Tour general classification results timeline=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Grand Tour ! scope="col" | 2020 |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A pink jersey Giro d'Italia |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A yellow jersey Tour de France |— |- style="text- align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A red jersey Vuelta a España |IP |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Legend |- ! scope="row" | — | Did not compete |- ! scope="row" | DNF | Did not finish |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:French male cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
title: Clément Champoussin
